title: Imaginary Homelands - author uses color imagery

content.prompt: In the second paragraph (“The photograph . . . glorious Technicolor”), the author uses color imagery primarily to

choices.label: enrich his understanding of what his life would have been like if he had stayed in India
contrast the vibrancy of his recent experience with the drabness of the past as he had remembered it
capture the intensity of a child’s wonder in exploring the natural world
create a visual association between forgetfulness and darkness

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
